text: What's up to all the outliers, Eric here. I got a fun video for you today. For new traders, really for any trader, don't use a paid discord server. They are absolutely garbage. I've been invited to a bunch of them. I haven't found a good one yet. Not to say that there might not be a good one out there, but a far better use of your time and energy used to buy a book. Now, another thing, I do not hate the hustle.
